thread.title: With Cubs advancing, spotlight shines on Wrigley
thread.title_full: With Cubs advancing, spotlight shines on Wrigley

title: With Cubs advancing, spotlight shines on Wrigley
text:
> Top News With Cubs advancing, spotlight shines on Wrigley Chicago Cubs pitcher Kyle Hendricks arrives at Wrigley Field for a team workout in preparation for Tuesday's Game 3 in baseball's National League Championship Series against the New York Mets, Monday, Oct. 19, 2015, in Chicago. (AP Photo/Nam Y. Huh)
